alert.note: Alert for Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 4:46PM CDT until May 21 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Rankin County in central Mississippi... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 445 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pelahatchie, or 9 miles northeast of Brandon, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Fannin and Pisgah around 505 PM CDT. Goshen Springs around 510 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
